comment._content: Eugene Turpin (1848-1927), French chemist; here's his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eug%C3%A8ne_Turpin

comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Are you certain this is Eugene Turpin? The men look different between the photo on Wikipedia and here

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Hmmm, the wikipedia image probably shows him younger (it was published in 1894), but to my eye it's the same face and mustache. Turpin (1848-1927) would have been in his late 60s here.

comment.author: 94563365@N00
comment._content:
It was a sad story.
As a chemist, he developed a super growth chicken feed.  Unfortunatley, one day as he shouldered his way through the flock they turned on him and pecked him to death.
